snippet: One group of tourists had to scrap a planned visit to the Grand Canyon and instead found themselves learning about the Navajo and the Hopi Indians, to whom the government shutdown has been a boon.
abstract: One group of tourists had to scrap a planned visit to the Grand Canyon and instead found themselves learning about the Navajo and the Hopi Indians, to whom the government shutdown has been a boon.

headline.main: National Parks Closed, Indian Lands Open
